articles.title: What's Going On With Meta Platforms Stock?
articles.summary: Shares of Meta Platforms traded marginally lower Wednesday afternoon. The stock is fell as the company's massive spending on artificial intelligence comes into sharper focus.
articles.translated_title: What's Going On With Meta Platforms Stock?

articles.title: Gen Z will be hurt-and helped-the most by generative AI in these types of jobs
articles.summary: Stanford's new research could be the largest study yet on how artificial intelligence is actually changing the workforce. Here's what it found.
articles.translated_title: Gen Z will be hurt-and helped-the most by generative AI in these types of jobs
articles.translated_summary: Stanford's new research could be the largest study yet on how artificial intelligence is actually changing the workforce. Here's what it found.

articles.title: Nvidia Shows How the AI-Driven Rally in the S&P 500 Can Keep Going
articles.summary: Howard Marks is right. This bull market just might have legs. Big tech continues to spend on artificial intelligence and interest rates are expected to go down. As long as the economy weathers the tariff transition, 2025 could prove more akin to 1997 — a few years before the dot com tech bubble burst -- than 1999. Here's how.

articles.title: Vercel Triples Valuation to $9 Billion With Accel Investment
articles.summary: Vercel, a startup that helps companies develop web and artificial intelligence applications in the cloud, is raising hundreds of millions of dollars at a valuation of about $9 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.
articles.translated_title: Vercel Triples Valuation to $9 Billion With Accel Investment
articles.translated_summary: Vercel, a startup that helps companies develop web and artificial intelligence applications in the cloud, is raising hundreds of millions of dollars at a valuation of about $9 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.

articles.title: Meta’s Already Bleeding AI Talent Two Months Into Hiring Spree
articles.summary: Zuckerberg’s quest to artificial superintelligence is off to a rocky start. OpenAI, however, gets the final laugh.
articles.translated_title: Meta’s Already Bleeding AI Talent Two Months Into Hiring Spree

articles.title: Nvidia Reports Earnings Today. What You Need To Know
articles.summary: Nvidia, the AI chipmaker at the heart of the artificial intelligence boom, is set to release its latest quarterly results after markets close later today, in what could prove to be a market-moving event.
articles.translated_title: Nvidia Reports Earnings Today. What You Need To Know

articles.title: Latam GPT will process more than 1 billion documents ahead of debut
articles.summary: Latam GPT, the first open-source artificial intelligence model developed in Latin America, has begun training and is processing more than 1 billion documents.
articles.translated_title: Latam GPT will process more than 1 billion documents ahead of debut
articles.translated_summary: Latam GPT, the first open-source artificial intelligence model developed in Latin America, has begun training and is processing more than 1 billion documents.

articles.title: OpenAI, Anthropic Team Up for Research on Hallucinations, Jailbreaking
articles.summary: OpenAI and Anthropic, two of the biggest rivals in artificial intelligence, recently evaluated each others’ models in an effort to better understand issues that their own tests may have missed.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI, Anthropic Team Up for Research on Hallucinations, Jailbreaking
articles.translated_summary: OpenAI and Anthropic, two of the biggest rivals in artificial intelligence, recently evaluated each others’ models in an effort to better understand issues that their own tests may have missed.

articles.title: Anthropic Says Attacker Used AI Tool in Widespread Hacks
articles.summary: A hacker leveraged technology from Anthropic PBC as part of a vast cybercrime scheme that’s impacted at least 17 organizations, the company said, marking an “unprecedented” instance of attackers weaponizing a commercial artificial intelligence tool on a widespread basis.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic Says Attacker Used AI Tool in Widespread Hacks
articles.translated_summary: A hacker leveraged technology from Anthropic PBC as part of a vast cybercrime scheme that’s impacted at least 17 organizations, the company said, marking an “unprecedented” instance of attackers weaponizing a commercial artificial intelligence tool on a widespread basis.

articles.title: New Michigan laws ban AI-generated pornography
articles.summary: It's now illegal in Michigan to create images via artificial intelligence that falsely portrays a specific person in sexual activity or situations.
